active_learning.discussion_prompt: In a security facility with a long corridor, debate the trade-offs of using a shallow DOF lens (better for close-up identification) versus a deep DOF lens (better for wide-area monitoring). Consider factors like intruder distance, lighting, and budget—provide evidence from manufacturer guidelines (e.g., Axis or Hikvision DOF calculators).

Ensure distractors are similar in length and complexity
